data.title: Coordinates of the meteorological stations of the study area.
data.meta_description: Download scientific diagram | Coordinates of the meteorological stations of the study area. from publication: Modelling Climate Change Impact on Irrigation Water Requirement and Yield of Winter Wheat (Triticum aestivum L.), Barley (Hordeum vulgare L.), and Fodder Maize (Zea mays L.) in the Semi-Arid Qazvin Plateau, Iran | It is very important to determine the irrigation water requirement (IR) of crops for optimal irrigation scheduling under the changing climate. This study aimed to investigate the impact of climate change on the future IR and yield of three strategic crops (winter wheat,... | Barley, Maize and Wheat | ResearchGate, the professional network for scientists.
